replies.body: Event Passes again? I thought Riot learned their lesson the few times they tried having Event Passes and instead just pissed everyone off cause it means you have to literally buy your way into the event. What's worse is that unless you buy the Event Pass, you practically can't get any of the good loot from the event considering you can only get 360 Worlds Token from the normal missions, which gets you a **single** border or Worlds Orb. There is gonna be some backlash from this one; talk about bad decision making.
Real talk though; why in the world would you want all 48 chromas?
If you want to be "a collector" then be prepared to pay collector pricing

Unpopular opinion here. When Riot announced they would have to cut on some stuff for Worlds because of cost, everyone said "sell event passes" now they're doing it and its still met with complaints? Bohoo you can't get any of the "good" loot, my dude, Riot is giving you a FREE skin shard. In addition to, ahem, the fact that the entire game is free! Like Jesus, some people can never get enough, maybe they should just remove all the extra free stuff and make you pay $80 for the base game, stop updating it bi-weekly, and still charge you for skins like any other game out there that you've probably spent way less time on. Maybe then there wouldn't be any complaining.

You're definitely right there, but the fact that assuming you buy the pass, complete every single worlds mission, and do every single First Win with the pass since day one, you can achieve a maximum of 920 tokens. This is **37%** of the massive amount of **2500 tokens** required for popstar Kai'sa. This would require getting an A score AND winning in **158 games** in order to make up the difference. Surely you don't see a problem with this??? I don't have a problem with the idea of a pass, I really don't. In fact, I bought it, but after realizing what a complete and blatant rip off it is it seriously irritates me.

158 games over the course of 54 days really isn't that much though. If you can average 3 wins per day (about 2-2 1/2 hours assuming a couple losses) then you'll get plenty of value out of the pass.

The pass isn't for everyone; it's intended for those players who have a lot of time to sink. In addition, farming the tokens via ARAM isn't that bad because while the rewards are slightly lower, the games are done in about a third of the time.

It's not a rip-off, it just has an intended audience like most other things. I'm personally out of work for a few weeks with a broken foot, so for me I can get a large amount of value out of the pass since I have about 4-6 weeks to sit around doing a whole lot of nothing but ARAM farming or ranked grind. I'm someone in the targeted audience; so are streamers, students, etc.

???
People literally complained that Riot had no way for people to support Worlds besides the Championship skin. They even compared it to Dota's TI Pass, and now people like you are complaining that there is a battle pass???
This was my same thought, though the Worlds Pass doesn't contribute to the prize pool. If it contributed to the prize pool, I'd be all over it, but as it stands I'm on the fence.

Ran the math on the current store.

Subtracting the new Kha'Zix skin from this since I got it from Hextech crafting.

It would still cost:

640RP-Champion shipward
1,650RP-World Pass
1,045RP-Championship Kha'Zix
62,160RP-All Esport team Chroma Bundles.(9,360RP just for all the chromas.)
81,250RP-All World's Token collectables(Gold chromas, Borders, ward, emote, etc.)
--------------
Total=146,745RP rounding up 150,000RP approximately for everything or 1,000$USD.

Even if you were to do ALL of the missions you'd barely even be able to get any of the good rewards(Provided you have the corresponding championship skin to begin with.)

Riot I like the game, I like the content your company brings...But Jesus tap-dancing Christ...Even as a collector I have to draw the line in the sand somewhere at some point and this is definitely one of those times, these prices are just insane for a limited time only event.


GG no RE, Riot Games.

Sorry I forgot to add in the extra cost of Kai'Sah Prestige edition which will cost 2,500 Worlds tokens which equates to an additional 31,250RP/210$USD.

Which brings in a new total of 177,995RP rounding up approximately for everything to instead 180,000RP or 1,210$USD.

Hi, back with more math.

For those that do buy worlds pass you are able to earn 340 tokens in the given missions total, you are also given 200 tokens in the bundle itself. 

You have the chance of gaining 540 tokens if you were to complete the first win of the day worlds mission EVERY DAY for 10 worlds tokens starting from September 27th through November 19th.

So adding up:

200
340
540
-------
1,080 tokens total possible for worlds pass, IF you have it.


So how are you supposed to earn the rest for Pop star Kai'Sah?

"IN THEORY" you can gain the rest by playing naturally. 

If you were to WIN with average of B+ and below you earn 6 tokens. 

If you LOSE with a average score of B+ and below you earn 3 token.

So you would need to win 237 games on Summoners rift which would give you 1,426 worlds tokens.

Or lose 474 games of Summoners rift which would give you 1,426 worlds tokens.

Mind you you only have 54 days to complete such a daunting task. 

Good luck to those that actually want to take on this challenge.

So what you're saying is we have to pay ~$10 to really participate in the event since you get almost no tokens without the pass (360) and even if you do it's a massive grind to get the stuff you paid for? Sounds good to me. Good luck getting that fucking Kai'sa skin unless you can play league all day. Don't get me wrong I like that the game is free but isn't this event supposed to hype Worlds not add a paywall to content?

I don't think you quite understand what paywalls actually are. A paywall is like in a F2P phone game, where you run out of energy trying to do something, and have to pay to replenish, pay to increase inventory size, pay to buy that one specific item to allow you to complete the mission etc. League DOES NOT utilize paywalls. What you pay for is EXCLUSIVELY aesthetic content that in no way affects the gameplay. Don't act like a victim when nothing in this event is critical to you playing this game. It's all for looks and appearances, and nothing except your skill at this game is going to prevent you from doing anything related to gameplay.

Paywall- an arrangement whereby access is restricted to users who have paid to subscribe

Access to unlocking the "rewards" is restricted to those who pay. If they want to release content we have to pay for I don't care that is how a business works. The problem is they are releasing the content under the idea that it is free and everyone can participate when it's really not. You have to buy the World Pass otherwise it's a month of grinding for a single border. The problem is it's a slimy tactic for sucking people into paying. The chromas cost 40 more points than you can get over the whole month event so you actually cant even get the good part of the event. They are giving you a hit of a drug to get you addicted.

Not once did I play the victim card  I just expressed my discontent with the way the event was being handled.

"Tons of rewards".   BULLstuffing,  there's almost no reward at all for people who don't no-life your game AND pay just to participate in the event.   Grinding for days+ to do all those missions barely rewards anything at all,  and even if you pay you have to sacrifice your soul to the game to earn stuff.
I suggest getting rid of the pass entirely, or rework its benefits. 
Triple the token rewards across the board,  maybe the pass could make it x5 from what it is now, or double the adjusted amount, and gives you a couple pass exclusive items up front (A border, an icon, an emote or two, and the current lump sum of upfront tokens).

I'm extremely disappointed Halloween content is being locked behind this same paywall + grindwall.
How much would it cost to get all the exclusive content? Every border, every chroma, and so on that isn't coming back next year? Has anyone done the math?

If you wanted to get at least 1 of every item from the event loot, it takes roughly 10,000 tokens in total. I don't know how much RP that converts into, but it'll definitely cost a pretty decent amount.
2,500 tokens for Prestige Kai'sa is 250$ I read,  so I would guess a thousand dollars for 10,000.
If you're really a collector, the Kaisa is essentially free.  You just roll her in hextech because she's the only skin you don't have.  Keep it High Lollin.

This is probably the **ONLY** way we'll be able to get her unless you have money running out of your eyeballs.

You know nothing. You are talking like the company that not only produces the game you play (for thousands, if not millions worldwide), but also foots the bill for the eSports venue, advertising, event planning, and everything else involved with keeping the game going and the event going, is somehow not entitled to the revenue that their event is going to generate. Like do you think they do all of this out of good will and donations? They do it to make money, so they can keep doing it in the future. You are not considering that employees have salaries - ranging from probably 25K a year for like their cleaning crew to upwards of 40-50K for their programmers, tech people, and then even higher for upper management. Get a grip on reality. Riot cannot operate on fumes if they want to be a successful business. They have to take a cut of the revenue they generate.

PLUS, those eSports players would be absolutely nothing without Riot keeping the game going. Their salaries and careers are 100% dependent on Riot keeping their lights on.

The pass idea is ok but if this is a response to the dota battle pass then it should do some more things. First of all it should add in some % to the worlds prize pool. Also there should be some milestones rewards when the prize pool reaches x value. And while things like the golden chromas and the prestige skin are a step in the right direction, the overall content this pass gives feels a bit bare bones, considering the dota battle pass gives access to alternate game modes, special particle effects, a card collecting system, etc.
I know a lot of those things aren't possible for league and I like the idea of a worlds pass but it could definitely be fleshed out more into something that feels more like an event pass rather than "just a bunch of bundled skins you have to grind for" pass.
